name: Breakfast Burritos
ingredients: 10 Flour tortillas (burrito sized) 1/3 pound ham, diced (or bacon, cooked and crumbled)
2 Tbsp butter 1/2 pound cheddar cheese, shredded
steps: Cook potatoes in butter. Add onion & ham, cook until onion softens. Add eggs, salt & pepper.
Stir often until eggs are cooked through.
In each tortilla spread 1 tbsp salsa, some cheese and 1 cup egg mixture. Roll up tortilla and wrap in a paper towel.
Place burritos in ziplock bag and freeze. When ready to eat reheat in microwave at 50% power for 4 minutes.
Great for making ahead and eating on the go!
